question: Are there any papers that construct convolutional networks which are equivariant with respect to non-compact/non-abelian Lie groups?
answer_format: Your answer should be the title of the paper WITHOUT ANY EXPLANATION.

eval_kwargs.question: Are there any papers that construct convolutional networks which are equivariant with respect to non-compact/non-abelian Lie groups?
